item.description:
Useless clutter is visible. What do you suppose it says
about the invisible thinking or state of mind that produces it? 
NOW is always a good time to let go of
what no longer serves you. 

Tonight, begin to move from clutter to clarity. 
Decluttering is always an 'inside job' and, in this seminar, 
you'll discover how 'Clutter Clearing' works on the inner 
and outer worlds.

Enjoy a group hypnosis session and learn how to feel
better about yourself as you begin the process of
becoming more orderly.

Wear warm comfortable clothing and bring a pillow, mat, and blanket, if desired.

 

Preregistration required.

More details: http://www.hypnosis.ws

 

 

 

.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Clutter to Clarity - hypnosis seminar
